languages.text: {n}Абеляр хмурится.{/n} "Насколько мне известно, в прошлом род Гапрак получал в дар от Алого Братства подобных сервиторов, но сам я впервые вижу их".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр хмурится.{/n} "Насколько мне известно, в прошлом род Гапрак получал в дар от Алого Братства подобных сервиторов, но сам я впервые вижу их".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "As far as I know, House Gaprak has received such servitors from the crimson priesthood as gifts in the past, although this is my first time seeing one myself."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр хмурится.{/n} "Насколько мне известно, в прошлом род Гапрак получал в дар от Алого Братства подобных сервиторов, но сам я впервые вижу их".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "As far as I know, House Gaprak has received such servitors from the crimson priesthood as gifts in the past, although this is my first time seeing one with my own eyes."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "As far as I know, House Gaprak has received such servitors from the crimson priesthood as gifts in the past, although this is my first time seeing one with my own eyes."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉。{/n}“据我所知，贾帕克家族曾从机械修会那里得到过这样的机仆。不过，这还是我第一次亲眼见到。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "As far as I know, House Gaprak has received such servitors from the crimson priesthood as gifts in the past, although this is my first time seeing one myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉。{/n}“据我所知，贾帕克家族曾从机械修会那里得到过这样的机仆。不过，这还是我第一次亲眼见到。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "So weit ich weiß, hat Haus Gaprak solche Servitoren in der Vergangenheit als Geschenk der roten Priesterschaft erhalten, auch wenn ich heute zum ersten Mal selbst einen zu Gesicht bekomme."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "As far as I know, House Gaprak has received such servitors from the crimson priesthood as gifts in the past, although this is my first time seeing one myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "So weit ich weiß, hat Haus Gaprak solche Servitoren in der Vergangenheiht als Geschenk der roten Priesterschaft erhalten, auch wenn ich heute zum ersten Mal selbst einen zu Gesicht bekomme."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils.{/n} « D'après ce que je sais, le clergé écarlate a offert de tels servitors à la maison Gaprak par le passé, mais c'est la première fois que j'en vois un de mes propres yeux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "As far as I know, House Gaprak has received such servitors from the crimson priesthood as gifts in the past, although this is my first time seeing one myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils.{/n} « D'après ce que je sais, le clergé écarlate a offert de tels servitors à la maison Gaprak par le passé, mais c'est la première fois que j'en vois un de mes propres yeux. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard frunce el ceño.{/n} «Por lo que sé, la casa Gaprak ha recibido servidores como estos del sacerdocio carmesí anteriormente, pero es la primera vez que veo uno».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "As far as I know, House Gaprak has received such servitors from the crimson priesthood as gifts in the past, although this is my first time seeing one myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard frunce el ceño.{/n} «Por lo que sé, la casa Gaprak ha recibido servidores como estos del sacerdocio carmesí anteriormente, pero es la primera vez que veo uno».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは眉をひそめた。{/n}「我の知る限り、ギャプラック家は過去に真紅の神職から、サーヴィターを贈られたことがある。だが、本物を見るのは我も初めてだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "As far as I know, House Gaprak has received such servitors from the crimson priesthood as gifts in the past, although this is my first time seeing one myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは眉をひそめた。{/n}「我の知る限り、ギャプラック家は過去に真紅の神職から、サーヴィターを贈られたことがある。だが、本物を見るのは我も初めてだ」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Bildiğim kadarıyla bu hizmetörler, geçmişte kızıl rahiplerce Gaprak Hanesi'ne hediye edilmişti. Gerçi şahsen ilk defa görüyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns.{/n} "As far as I know, House Gaprak has received such servitors from the crimson priesthood as gifts in the past, although this is my first time seeing one myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Bildiğim kadarıyla bu hizmetörler geçmişte Gaprak Hanesi'ne kızıl rahiplerce hediye edilmişti. Gerçi şahsen ilk defa görüyorum."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
